author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Christina Milian puts her legs on show | Daily Mail Online
text: comments She works hard to keep her body in shape. And Christina Milian made sure everyone could admire the results of her gym addiction, as she put her toned legs on display on Friday night. The singer turned actress wore a thigh-baring outfit of torn micro shorts, teamed with matching denim boots. Scroll down for video Thigh's the limit! Christina Milian puts her legs on show in torn micro shorts and matching boots as she leaves Catch LA on Friday night Leggy lady: Christina teamed the revealing boots with a rather more conservative sweater Christina teamed the revealing combination with a rather more conservative Adidas sweater. Sharing an image of her outfit to Twitter, the 35-year-old wrote: 'Friday night vibes'. She was later pictured heading to the latest Hollywood hotspot, Catch LA. At 35, Christina has spent her adult life flitting between red carpets. But while she is a regular on the Hollywood social circuit, the early 2000s chart star is also making something of a professional comeback. 'Friday night vibes': She shared an image of her outfit to Twitter Red carpet regular: While she is a fixture on the Hollywood social circuit, the early 2000s chart star is also making something of a professional comeback She recently starred in the Rocky Horror Picture reboot on Fox as Magenta, the role made famous by Patricia Quinn, alongside Laverne Cox, Victoria Justice, Adam Lambert and Tim Curry. And the TV actress says she's working on releasing another album sometime this year. She has also attempted a foray into the world of reality TV, via her family show Turned Up. Music comes first: The TV actress says she's working on releasing another album Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
